title: Matlab exam
content: How does the Matlab exam go in the EC campus? Our math teacher told us we arenâ€™t allowed to use Matlab on the computer during the CBT so how will we solve the questions and stuff

comments.body: You gotta type the code brother

Can you not use the systems? For my batch we were taken to the MATLAB lab in the ground floor and they gave us one of the questions given in the record. We had to write the code on the answer booklet and execute and show it on the system. It's a very easy exam dw about it too much. U can sneak your phone inside if you're feeling brave, a lot of us did it.

They have us giving it like an isa....
From seating to batches
Then ig u just write the code and submit it. Good luck!
